HOME.DESCRIPTION: The application is used to calculate the perimeters, areas and volumes of the following 2D and 3D geometric shapes:
HOME.SHAPES: rectangle, square, triangle, equilateral triangle, ellipse, circle, cube, cuboid and sphere.
HOME.APPROXIMATION: An approximation of the Ramanujan, an Indian mathematician, was used to calculate the ellipse's circumference.

SELECTION.TITLE: Data selection
SELECTION.FILL: Before proceeding, please fill in the contents of the neighboring card.

ENTRY.TITLE: Data entry
ENTRY.FILL: Before proceeding, please fill in the contents of the neighboring card correctly.

SHAPE.NO_DATA: No data on the type of figure. Please select the shape again.
